summary:
BTS, a South Korean boy band, has taken the world by storm. Formed in 2010, they debuted in 2013 and quickly rose to fame with their unique blend of hip-hop and various music genres. The seven members write and produce their own songs, often exploring themes like mental health and self-love.

They've achieved remarkable success, topping global music charts and selling out concerts worldwide. BTS has won numerous awards and even addressed the United Nations. In 2022, they announced a break to fulfill their military service, planning to reunite in 2025.
title: BTS
